name.str: CAG small steel plate, NIJ III+
name.str_pl: CAG small steel plates, NIJ III+

description: A SAPI-cut ballistic plate with a single-curve profile, made of AR500 steel by Custom Armor Group.  On the outward-facing side there's manufacturer's logo.  This plate is rated for NIJ III+, which means it's been tested to survive at least 3 rounds of high-energy rifle rounds, and then some.  Plates like this one are intended to be inserted into a plate carrier where it will absorb the energy of multiple rifle rounds before requiring replacement.  This model is sized "small" and can only fit in carriers that allow small-sized plates.
